doc:div.p:
These tutorials cover the basics of creating messaging applications using RabbitMQ.
You need to have the RabbitMQ server installed to go through the tutorials ‒ please see the installation guide.

The tutorials here are in Python and Java, however, you may wish to review our list of tutorials in other languages. We also maintain a list of clients and developer tools for a range of different languages and platofrms that you may find useful.
Once you have been through the tutorials (or if you want to skip ahead), you may wish to browse our AMQP Quick Reference Guide.
